summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2671, for the improvement of 37th Avenue and 37th Avenue as established by Ordinance No. 27682, from East Marion Street to a point about 96 feet north of East Spring Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing wooden curbs and gutters, concrete walks and stairways and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31483 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
